page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: Our area is mostly Oulton Broad.To the west of our area there is the river Waveney.On one side of the river there is an Inn called the Waveney.On the other side there are farms and marshes. The marshes are called Petos Marsh and Share Marsh.Sprats Water is a nature reserve. In the North East end of our area is the residential part of Oulton Broad.The houses there are large and expensive.The railway track runs through our area and there is a small train station.In the main high street there is a small number of shops,mostly gift shops.There is a main broad where speed boat racing takes place.There is a hotel in Oulton Broad but most holiday makers will live on cruisers. There is a park near the broads which has a cafe and amusements.
